text: Barham Salih (; ; born 12 September 1960) is an Iraqi Kurdish politician who was the 8th President of Iraq from 2 October 2018 to 17 October 2022. ==References== ==Other websites== *Dr. Barham Salih's official website *Dr. Barham Salih on Facebook *Dr. Barham Salih on Twitter *Dr. Barham Salih on YouTube * Category:1960 births Category:Living people Category:Presidents of Iraq
title: Barham Salih
